scripts.serve: yarn run ensure-images && node ./node_modules/polyserve/bin/polyserve -p 5100 -P h2 --proxy-path api --proxy-target http://localhost:9000/api/
scripts.serve-build: yarn run ensure-images && node ./node_modules/polyserve/bin/polyserve build/bundled/ -p 5100 -P h2 --proxy-path api --proxy-target http://localhost:9000/api/
